```{r}
library(lorem)
library(stringr)
library(withr)

with_seed(
  seed = 86521,
  code = {
    ipsum(1, avg_words_per_sentence = 30) |>
      as.character() |>
      str_remove(".$") |>
      paste0(" [@gell-mann2023].") |>
      cat(sep = "\n\n")
  }
)
```

## Heading 2

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

library(lorem)
library(stringr)
library(withr)

with_seed(
  seed = 1252543,
  code = {
    c(
      ipsum(1, avg_words_per_sentence = 12) |>
        as.character() |>
        str_remove(".$") |>
        paste0(" [@lecun2015]."),
      ipsum(1, avg_words_per_sentence = 14) |>
        as.character() |>
        str_remove(".$") |>
        paste0(" [@foster1972].")
    ) |>
      cat(sep = "\n\n")
  }
)
```
